alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 3:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, north central Taylor, southeastern Leon and western Madison Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Quitman to near Monticello to Tallahassee. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Madison, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greenville, Lake Bradford, Cody, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Griffin Heights, Drifton, Lovett, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall and Midtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Leon; Madison
